fine_dining.name: Entrée
signature_dishes: Duck with beetroot and duck jus
fine_dining.atmosphere: Elegant and sophisticated with focus on seasonal dining
fine_dining.booking_tips: Book well in advance for tasting menu with wine pairing. Highly recommended for food enthusiasts
fine_dining.michelin_potential: High quality worthy of Michelin recognition
fine_dining.local_tips: Order the tasting menu for the full experience - changes seasonally

fine_dining.name: Moravská restaurace
signature_dishes: Olomoucký řízek (schnitzel stuffed with tvarůžky cheese)
fine_dining.atmosphere: Elegant traditional setting with refined atmosphere
fine_dining.booking_tips: Family restaurant operating since 1996, book for special occasions
fine_dining.local_tips: Try regional specialties, especially anything with Olomoucké tvarůžky cheese

casual_dining.name: Eatery & Bakery
casual_dining.atmosphere: Modern and relaxed in historic Military bakery setting
casual_dining.booking_tips: Located in Baroque Locatelli bastion, part of Long Shorty Short Hostel
casual_dining.local_tips: Small menu but exceptional quality dishes in unique historic setting

casual_dining.name: Morgan's Restaurant
casual_dining.atmosphere: Vibrant beer hall atmosphere in 18th century bastion
casual_dining.booking_tips: Great for groups and casual dining, exposed brick walls add character
casual_dining.local_tips: Perfect for traditional Czech fried cheese and local beer

casual_dining.name: Hostinec Moritz
casual_dining.atmosphere: Traditional Czech pub atmosphere with microbrewery
casual_dining.booking_tips: Non-smoking restaurant since always, fresh Czech cuisine daily
casual_dining.local_tips: Try their fresh unfiltered beer straight from the tank

casual_dining.name: Svatováclavský Minipivovar
signature_dishes: Řezané Pivo (layered lager and dark beer)
casual_dining.atmosphere: Microbrewery with beer spa facilities underground
casual_dining.booking_tips: Combine dining with beer spa experience in underground wooden tubs
casual_dining.local_tips: Perfect comfort food after exploring the city, try the beer spa

coffee_shops.name: Coffee Library
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Student-oriented with great selection of coffees and traditional cakes
coffee_shops.food_options: Wide selection of cakes, sandwiches, and wraps
coffee_shops.local_tips: Try the traditional Czech Christmas cookies Pařížské rohlíčky

coffee_shops.name: Kafec at Villa Primavesi
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Upscale café in beautiful Art Nouveau villa setting
coffee_shops.food_options: Brunch dishes, gourmet hot dogs, Eggs Florentine, loaded waffles
coffee_shops.local_tips: Visit for the architectural beauty of Villa Primavesi and excellent coffee quality

wine_bars.name: Vinný šenk U Zlatého beránka
wine_bars.atmosphere: Intimate wine cellar with rustic brick walls and educational focus
wine_bars.local_tips: Book the wine and chocolate pairing for unique educational experience

local_specialties.description: Unique Czech cheese with 600+ year history, strong smell and distinctive taste. Served with paprika, caraway seeds, bread, butter, and raw onions. The only cheese of truly Czech origin.
Regional garlic soup from Haná region, enhanced with Olomoucké tvarůžky cheese, ham, onions, and eggs. Different from standard Czech garlic soup.
Pork schnitzel stuffed with Olomoucké tvarůžky cheese and bacon, served with mashed potatoes. Regional specialty of Olomouc.
Regional sweet pastry with double filling of plum jam and cottage cheese with vanilla, topped with crumble. Traditional dessert of the Haná region.

drinks.name: Moravian Wine
drinks.description: Local wines from nearby vineyards, particularly white varieties like Riesling and Grüner Veltliner. Many restaurants offer local wine pairings.

drinks.name: Microbrewery Beer
drinks.description: Fresh unfiltered beer from local microbreweries like Moritz and Svatováclavský. Often served directly from tanks.

drinks.name: Řezané Pivo
drinks.description: Layered beer combining lager and dark beer, creating distinct two-colored layers. Specialty of local breweries.

drinks.name: Becherovka
drinks.description: Traditional Czech herbal liqueur, served as digestif. Available in most restaurants.

specialty_tastings.name: Olomoucké Tvarůžky Museum Tasting
specialty_tastings.booking_tips: Must be ordered 24 hours in advance, always for 10 people or multiples

specialty_tastings.name: Beer Spa Experience
specialty_tastings.booking_tips: Combine with lunch at Svatováclavský Minipivovar for full experience

local_markets.name: Olomoucký Tvarůžkový Festival
local_markets.local_tips: Best time to experience tvarůžky culture and try various preparations

winter: Svatomartinské husí hody (St. Martin's goose feast)
